name: Colour Knight
description:
How to Play

find your way though the procedurally  generated dungeon, where you will find a unusual puzzle, once the puzzle is solved it will take you deeper into the dungeon and you might just run into a boss or two. Buy upgrades at the store and make sure to switch to the correct colour.

(if you get stuck at the puzzle look at the bottom of this.)

HAVE FUN!

Controls
  • A,S,D,W - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • L Click - Attack
  • R Click - Block
  • Q,E - Cycle Colour
  • Spacebar - Dash
  • G - Throw Grenade
  • F - Purchase from store, open chest

From the main menu click play. Choose whether or not you want to do the tutorial (recommended). You are now playing the game.

Solving Puzzles

- Simon says (flashing tiles puzzle) make sure you kill the enemy in the same order the lights flash.

- totem poll, turn all the polls the opposite colour. You'll have to hit them in the correct order, make sure to use the reset button.
